name: Ninja Revinja Online - Real Kids Racing Runner
name_original: Ninja Revinja Online - Real Kids Racing Runner
description:
**Top 10 Games in 7 Countries!!**
Action packed with all of your favorite Japanese assassin tricks, Ninja Revinja is crammed tighter than a Tokyo commuter train with amazing Ninjitsu action—like the ability to dodge obstacles, run on walls, turn tight corners and throw Ninja Stars with deadly accuracy! Ichi Ban!

"Easy to learn, insanely hard to master!"
-Ben K.
"Amazing graphics, smooth gameplay, all around A+ game."
-Katherine H.
"I love how the music gets more intense as the game progresses."
-Mike D.

Features:
-> Amazing 3D graphics
-> Exciting gameplay
-> Intuitive Controls
-> Upgrades to increase your score
-> Build up your score multiplier during games by collecting ninja stars
developers: Sizzle Entertainment: The Best Fun Free Cool Apps and Top Addicting Games
